mapper.select: select w.name fromwarehouse,w2.name towarehouse,u.name creator, a.* from t_erp_dispatch_oversea_form a LEFT JOIN t_erp_warehouse w on a.from_warehouseid = w.id LEFT JOIN t_erp_warehouse w2 on a.to_warehouseid = w2.id LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u on a.creator=u.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR};

SELECT a.arrivalTime,a.number shipmentid,a.createdate, a.audittime shiped_date ,b.sellersku sku, b.amount Quantity,ifnull(detail.channame,'暂无') channame, b.amount shipQuantity from t_erp_dispatch_oversea_form a LEFT JOIN t_erp_dispatch_oversea_form_entry b on b.formid=a.id LEFT JOIN t_erp_dispatch_oversea_trans ts on ts.formid=a.id LEFT JOIN t_erp_warehouse w on w.id=a.to_warehouseid left join t_erp_ship_transdetail detail on detail.id = ts.channel where b.sellersku=#{sku,jdbcType=CHAR} and a.auditstatus >= 2 and a.auditstatus <= 3
and w.country in ('DE','FR','IT','ES','PL','NL')
and w.country =#{country,jdbcType=CHAR}
and (w.groupid is null or w.groupid=#{groupid,jdbcType=CHAR})
and a.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY a.arrivalTime asc
